# ModalDialogViewModelBase.Width property

The width of the dialog. If not provided, the dialog will have a default size.

```csharp
public int? Width { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

The width of the dialog can only be set in the object initializer, as it is not applied dynamically to the dialog.
